formatted_address: 26 Beach Rd, B1-K3 South Beach Avenue, Singapore 189768
name: OCBC ATM - South Beach Avenue

reviews.text: Located right by 7 Eleven, the ATM stack is right by each other, close to the MRT entrance. It's kept underground, under shelter, closer towards Suntec side of the underground; so you'll unlikely run into inconvenience issues. Not the easiest ATMs to find, but if need be, just look for 7 Eleven and you'll likely be able to find them.

vicinity: 26 Beach Road, B1-K3 South Beach Avenue
